column3: Traffic;Kampong Cham:------ A truck full of cassava  crashed into motorbike
column4: dragging it for more than 20 meters
column5: and killing the rider on the morning of September 30
column6: 2018.------This horrific traffic accident occurred on the National Road No. 7 near the entrance to Phnom Pros and Phnom Srey Resort in Andong village. Namp commune
column9: Kampong Cham province. After the accident
column10: the truck driver of the truck “Sihanoukville 3A-5742” ran away from the scene.------The victim was named as 60-year-old woman
